title: Saving Zoe
description: PIn Alyson Noeuml;l's newest teen novel, one sister's secrets save the other's life#151;in more ways than one.PMeet fifteen-year-old Echo, a typical teen trying to survive high school without being totally traumatized by boy trouble, friend drama, and school issues. As if she didn't have enough on her plate, Echo is also still dealing with the murder of her sister Zoeuml;. Although it's been over a year, Echo is still reeling from tragedy that changed everything. Beautiful and full of life, Zoeuml; was the glue that held her family together, and although the two sisters were as different as night and day, they still had a bond that Echo can't let go of. When Zoeuml;'s old boyfriend Marc shows up one day with Zoeuml;'s diary, Echo doesn't think there's anything in there she doesn't already know. But as she gives in to curiosity and starts reading, she learns that her sister led a secret life that no one could have guessed#151;not even Echo.
author: Alyson Noel
